title: honor level 3 (capsule) question
body: i didnt get any honor capsule on my level 3. Now i'm level 4 can i still get some or is it even normal i didnt get one? my friend also didnt get any at level 3

replies.body: Levels will continue to unlock additional content, not necessarily replace them.  Even at Level 4, you should still get capsules but they are random drops!
